title: Education Role Type Vocabulary
description: Controlled vocabulary for roles held by people in education institutions and governance structures.

terms.label: Student
terms.definition: A person enrolled in an education program or institution as a learner.

terms.label: Teacher or Instructor
terms.definition: A person who delivers instruction or facilitates learning in an education program or course.

terms.label: Administrator
terms.definition: A person with administrative responsibility at an institution, such as principal, dean, or department chair.

terms.label: Governing Official
terms.definition: A member of a governing board, council, or similar oversight body for an education institution or system.

terms.label: Support Staff
terms.definition: A staff member providing non-instructional support services, such as counseling, technology support, or operations.

terms.label: Parent or Guardian
terms.definition: A person with legal or primary responsibility for a student, engaged with the institution on the student's behalf.

terms.label: Other Education Role
terms.definition: A role related to education that does not fit another, more specific category in this vocabulary.
